result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dallas Joe Roseland

records.addlTxt: Initial appearance on November 17, 2022 at 08:45 am.

2:45 PM Called 22CF102 and 22CF187 scheduled for INIT and 22CT10 for STC.  Attorney Chris A Gramstrup in court for Dallas Joe Roseland.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin. Phone number 320.... 956 has called in. This is the phone number Attny Gramstrup has for the def, however we can't hear him. Clerk restarts the speaker phone and def can be heard, appears by telephone at 2:49pm. Defendant Dallas Joe Roseland appeared by phone.  Attny Grampstrup would request for def to be allowed to appear remotely and confirms it is the def.  Def requests to reschedule. Def makes a good faith effort, so court is willing to reset.  Initial appearance scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Initial appearance on October 13, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

10:46 AM Cases 22CF102, 22CF187, and 22CT10 called together.  Defendant Dallas Joe Roseland in court.  Attorney Chris A Gramstrup appeared by video for Dallas Joe Roseland.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases 22CF102 and 22CF187 scheduled for an Initial Appearance.  Def wants all in person hearing.  Bond continues.
Initial appearance scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Initial appearance on September 15, 2022 at 10:30 am.

9:54 AM Cases 22CF102, 2022CF000187, and 2022CT000010 called together.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Dallas Joe Roseland appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Chris A Gramstrup appeared by video for Dallas Joe Roseland.  Cases 22CF102 and 22CF187 on for initial appearance, 22CT10 on for status conference.  Defendant wants an all in person hearing.
Initial appearance scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 10:30 am.
on Petition for Appointment of an Attorney

10:54 AM Court calls 22CF102 and 22CF187 for INIT and 22CT10 for STC. Court formally appoints Attny Gramstrup and will reset INIT's.  Prosecuting attorney James Jay Rennicke Esq in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Dallas Joe Roseland appeared by video, in custody in the Burnett County jail.  Attny Chris Gramstrup appears by video. Rescheduled for Initial appearance scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Initial appearance on August 16, 2022 at 09:45 am.

records.addlTxt: No use or possession of any illegal drugs, paraphernalia, or controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Subject to random testing of breath, blood or urine by any law enforcement or corrections officer upon arrest or reasonable suspicion.
